title: Century Bold Engravers Typeface
content:
Hey Everyone,

Trying to find a link to buy the engraving version of Century Bold — anyone know of a place?

Thanks in advance!  
Ryan Mercer
author: r44mercer

comments.content:
Thanks for the help! I found a little clarification on what I'm looking for — Double Line Century Bold or 2L Century Bold. It's used specifically in engraving.

Thanks!
